author: Rocket Fuel
title: Publishers and Ad Networks Gain Access to Rocket Fuel’s Self Service DSP, DMP and Comprehensive Training Program to Expand Reach and Unlock New Revenue Opportunities
text:
REDWOOD CITY, Calif.--(BUSINESS WIRE)--
Rocket Fuel ( FUEL ), the leading Programmatic Marketing Platform provider with Moment Scoring™ technology, today announced that ad sellers, including publishers and networks, now have access to a broader set of products and services within Rocket Fuel’s Programmatic Marketing Platform, an integrated SaaS platform which includes an industry leading self-service Demand-Side Platform (DSP) and Data Management Platform (DMP). These offerings are designed to securely work with an ad seller’s unique and proprietary first-party data to offer a more robust audience monetization solution. 
Rocket Fuel formerly served its community of more than 100 publishers and ad networks through its Audience Accelerator sub-brand. Ad sellers can now access a broader range of products and services through the Rocket Fuel platform to activate and monetize their first-party data. Rocket Fuel has appointed John Ferraro as vice president of publisher partnerships to lead the business unit. 
“Ad sellers are an important business unit for Rocket Fuel and we are pleased to offer additional products and services designed to help them activate and monetize their first-party data,” said John Ferraro, vice president of publisher partnerships at Rocket Fuel. “As an early Rocket Fuel client, I’ve long maintained that the technology underpinning Rocket Fuel’s offerings is in a category of its own; as a leader of the publisher team, I continue to be impressed by the company’s commitment to the ad seller community and the training and support infrastructure in place to make our clients successful.” 
“These expanded Rocket Fuel offerings are a great addition to our NCM Cinema Accelerator product, which allows advertisers to reach moviegoers as they extend their movie-going experience with social, display, mobile and video,” said Ian Owen-Ward, Senior Vice President of Digital with National CineMedia (NCM). “With several successful campaigns by major brands completed and more underway, Rocket Fuel’s augmented resources – including a robust self-service audience extension program available within the DSP for our regional sales efforts and a terrific detailed training program to help make our team even more successful – have been a significant benefit to accomplishing everything we set out to achieve.” 
In addition to the self-service DSP and DMP, ad sellers can also leverage a private marketplace offering introduced earlier this year to get better performance from their premium owned and operated inventory, as well as leverage its longstanding audience extension programs currently available to clients in the US and Europe. In conjunction with the expanded offerings, Rocket Fuel is also introducing a comprehensive sales training program and new go-to-market planning tools which enable our partners’ sales teams to hit the ground running in bringing consultative value to their advertisers and generating maximum sales revenue. 
John Ferraro Leads Publisher Partnership Team 
John Ferraro is a proven sales leader with over 20 years of experience in the media industry spanning digital, radio and television. As Vice President, Publisher Partnerships at Rocket Fuel he leads the publisher team focusing on platforms and services that enable ad sellers, including publishers and networks, to activate and monetize their first-party data. 
Before joining Rocket Fuel, John spent over six years as VP, Advertising Sales at Whitepages, where he championed the expansion of programmatic services for advertisers. His career spans myriad leadership roles in radio, broadcast television and cable television including Director of Online Sales and Marketing for KING Television, where he managed all digital sales and marketing efforts for the Seattle NBC affiliate as well as a 24-hour regional cable news channel. 
Programmatic Marketing Platform Powered by Moment Scoring 
Rocket Fuel’s platform leverages Moment Scoring, a real-time calculation of each ad opportunity based on a marketer’s goal to determine the likelihood a consumer will engage in a desired action across channels, devices, and objectives. Moment Scoring automatically optimizes media spend across addressable programmatic channels to improve performance. As Rocket Fuel ad sellers’ clients use the platform to activate their first, second, and third-party data across both owned and paid media channels, they can deliver integrated, personalized advertising campaigns at specific customer touch points and operational moments, for a better return on ad spend (ROAS). 
Rocket Fuel’s expanded set of products and services are now available to ad sellers. Additional information on Rocket Fuel’s ad seller offerings is available at http://www.rocketfuel.com/en/programmatic-marketing-platform/publishers/ . 
About Rocket Fuel 
Rocket Fuel ( FUEL ) is the leading Programmatic Marketing Platform provider with Moment Scoring™ technology. The company offers brands and agencies managed services, as well as a SaaS-based Data Management Platform (DMP) and Demand Side Platform (DSP), to optimize performance, awareness, and lift across marketing objectives, channels and devices. By applying its unrivaled Artificial Intelligence at Big Data scale, Rocket Fuel’s Moment Scoring™ performs a real-time calculation of each ad opportunity based on a marketer’s goal to determine the likelihood a consumer will engage in a desired action. Moment Scoring goes beyond 1:1 marketing by learning to predict what marketing actions to take with a campaign at a precise moment in time, which results in a much more efficient use of marketing dollars. Rocket Fuel serves 96 of the Ad Age 100, three of the top five agency holding company trading desks, and partners with some of the world’s leading CRM platforms, marketing platforms and systems integrators. Headquartered in Redwood City, California, Rocket Fuel has more than 20 offices worldwide.
